style: High Contrast Digital Illustration, Stylized Flat Graphic Shapes, Limited Color Palette, Heavy Grain Texture
use_case: Poster art, album covers, narrative concept art, dark fantasy book illustration.
template: A [SUBJECT] traversing a dark dividing line, separating the upper world from the subterranean abyss. The upper world is a [SCENE] in pale gray and black silhouette. The lower world is dominated by the glowing [COLOR] forms of haunting spirits. High contrast digital illustration, stylized flat vector shapes, simplified cartoon forms, heavy grain texture, dramatic lighting, bi-level composition (surface vs abyss), [MOOD] atmosphere, graphic novel aesthetic. --ar 4:5

variable_explanations.SUBJECT: The main focus object or character positioned on the dividing line (e.g., A lone astronaut, A vintage steam train, A medieval warship).
variable_explanations.MOOD: The emotional atmosphere (e.g., Gloomy, Mysterious, Foreboding, Desolate).
variable_explanations.COLOR: The vibrant hue of the spectral, subterranean figures (e.g., Coral Pink, Acid Green, Luminous Violet).
variable_explanations.SCENE: The stylized, silhouetted setting for the upper world (e.g., Venetian Canal, Ancient Ruins, Snowy Mountain Range).

tips: Use strong, simple nouns for [SUBJECT] to maintain the silhouette quality.
The [SCENE] variable should describe a distinct, recognizable silhouette to anchor the gray background.
Using a midjourney model (e.g., v6) will best replicate the texture and stylized flatness.
description: This template delivers deeply atmospheric, high-contrast illustration art defined by a powerful vertical split. It uses simplified, grainy shapes and a stark limited palette to evoke drama, isolating the subject above a glowing, menacing underworld.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

suggestions: Consider: cozy, vintage, surreal, elegant, vibrant
Add: scene, cover, portrait, landscape, texture

feedback.title_quality: The title 'Cinematic Sci-Fi Cityscape Wallpaper' perfectly adheres to all criteria. It follows the [Descriptor] + [Subject] + [Type] pattern, uses strong visual descriptors ('Cinematic', 'Sci-Fi'), and is the ideal length (4 words). It clearly communicates the output type ('Wallpaper'). (Score: 20/20)
feedback.template_structure: The template structure is exemplary. The subject variable '[subject]' is clearly marked and positioned correctly. The core style descriptors ('cinematic, dystopian, sci-fi style. High detail, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, dramatic shadows, cyberpunk aesthetic') constitute a strong majority of the prompt text, defining the aesthetic precisely. Technical specifications ('--ar 16:9 --v 6.0') are included and appropriate for the 'wallpaper' output type promised in the title. (Score: 30/30)
feedback.variable_examples: The provided examples ('Tokyo street', 'Futuristic skyscraper', 'Desert outpost', 'Underwater dome', 'Floating city', 'Abandoned factory', 'Cybernetic organism') demonstrate good range and a mix of specific, abstract, and categorical subjects. However, only 7 examples were provided, falling short of the required 8-10 for full credit. (Score: 18/20)
feedback.commercial_viability: The commercial viability is high. Use cases ('concept art, digital wallpaper, game assets') are clearly identified and appropriate for the output. The suggested price tier ($2.99) aligns with similar high-quality prompts on the marketplace. The unique value proposition (a high-resolution, specific sci-fi aesthetic for wallpapers) is solid, though not groundbreakingly unique, warranting a slight deduction. (Score: 14/15)
feedback.description_quality: The description is functional and clear. It includes a basic hook ('Create stunning sci-fi wallpapers...'), lists technical features ('high-resolution details and dramatic lighting'), and specifies use cases. The hook, while effective, could be more compelling or emotive to maximize conversion rates. (Score: 14/15)

priority_improvements: Add at least one more variable example to meet the 8-10 count requirement.
Refine the description hook to be more emotionally engaging and emphasize the unique visual style (e.g., 'Unleash breathtaking cinematic sci-fi worlds...').

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Unlock the immediate ability to generate terrifying, museum-quality graphic horror art without typing a single complex parameter.

*   **Cinematic Consistency:** Instantly applies a signature "Bi-Level Abyss" aesthetic—guaranteeing high-contrast, stark black and white imagery with perfectly calibrated, deep shadows every time, regardless of your subject.
*   **The Professional Edge:** Bypass the learning curve for advanced lighting. This template embeds expert-level volumetric lighting and dramatic chiaroscuro effects, giving your creations the polish of a seasoned graphic novelist.
*   **Subject Versatility:** Seamlessly integrate any concept—from monstrous portraits and dystopian landscapes to abstract terror—and watch it be translated into this stunning, proprietary horror style.

Perfect for artists seeking striking portfolio pieces, horror fans needing evocative social media content, and designers looking for unique, unsettling visual assets. Stop struggling with syntax; just plug in your idea, hit generate, and witness the abyss stare back.
_original_topic: Bi-Level Abyss: High Contrast Graphic Horror
enhancement_log: Title fixed: Bi-Level Abyss: High Contrast Graphic Horror -> Moody High Contrast Horror Illustration
